name: Knight of Deity Decree, Thasus
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with only <Genesis>  for its clan, look at the top three cards of your deck, choose up to one card from among them, put it into the soul, and put the rest on the bottom of the deck in any order.
[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if you have a vanguard with "Minerva" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & retire this unit], choose a card from your hand or drop, and put it into the soul. If you put from your hand, draw a card.
flavor: We know of an omniscient love while knowing not of anything.

effect:

[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if you have a vanguard with "Minerva" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & retire this unit], choose a card from your hand or drop, and put it into the soul. If you put from your hand, draw a card.

name: Spiritual King of Ignition, Valnout
effect: Additional Effect - Choose one of your [Stand] rear-guards, and it gets "[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]: At the end of the battle this unit attacked, [Stand] this unit." until end of turn. If you did not choose a card, draw a card, choose up to one unit card from your hand, and call it to (RC).

name: Spiritual King of Aquatics, Idosfaro
effect: Additional Effect - Choose a card from your drop, put it into hand, choose one of your units, and it gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn.
